quote: “Looking at small advantages prevents great affairs from being accomplished.”
author: Confucius

quote: “All people are the same; only their habits differ.”
author: Confucius

quote: “Learn advidly. Question it repeatedly. Analyze it carefully. Then put what you have learned into practice intelligently.”
author: Confucius

quote: “We have two lives; the second begins when we realize we only have one.”
author: Confucius
